titles.title: Beam from the ceiling of the Castle of Curiel de Campos (Valladolid)

texts.textentryhtml: Castle of Curiel de Campos (also known as Curiel de los Ajos), Valladolid; Valladolid dealer; sold to Alexandre Soler i March by 1934 (Barcelona); Adolph Loewi Gallery (?), New York; museum purchase, 1958.
